creditline: Gift of Judith Kaufer and Katherine Kaufer Christoffel in memory of their parents, George and Sonya Kaufer
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: seated polar bear holding the tail of a vertical seal in its mouth, with a vertical element between bear and seal; grey stone

title: Bear eating seal
